title.rendered: New Year, time for a 5G mobile upgrade?

content.rendered:
New Year, time for a 5G mobile upgrade? 

It’s finally here!  The Fonehouse January Sale is back again, with some incredible mobile phone deals to kickstart 2022 with. If you’ve been holding out for the latest Apple or Samsung 5G device, we’ve got you covered! 

5G mobile phones took off in 2021, in fact over 60% of you purchased one over a 4G handset last year.  Major networks such as Vodafone and Three are rolling out their 5G networks at a similar breakneck speed, offering super-fast mobile data coverage nationwide. 

The latest devices launched in 2021 feature newer 5G chipsets and will benefit from the fast network roll-out for 5G in the UK. 

5G devices 2 years ago came at a hefty premium. But with the recent launch of the Samsung FE 21 and devices from Honor, Xiaomi and Samsung you can get the benefits of 5G without breaking the bank in 2022. Starting from just £15.50/pm with no upfront!  

Our latest deals won’t be here for long. Fonehouse January sale promotions will run online and instore until the end of January. Hurry, whilst you still can get one of these amazing new year deals! 

Top Selling 5G Mobile Handsets from Apple, Samsung and Google 

Apple: 

iPhone 13 128GB | Three | £44 /pm | £0.00 upfront | 100GB data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts 

iPhone 13 Pro 128GB | Three | £51 /pm | £39.00 upfront | 100GB data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts 

iPhone 12 64GB | Three | £37 /pm | £0.00 upfront | 100GB data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts 

iPhone 12 Pro 256GB (Graphite and Pacific Blue) | Three | £50 /pm | £0.00 upfront | Unlimited data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts 

Samsung: 

Samsung Galaxy FE 128GB | Three | £29 /pm | £0.00 upfront | 30GB data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts 

Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 128GB | Three | £50 /pm | £0.00 upfront | 30GB data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts 

Samsung Galaxy S21 128GB (Violet, Pink, White) | Three | £34 /pm | £0.00 upfront | 100GB data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts 

Other: 

Google Pixel 6 128GB | Three | £37 /pm | £0.00 upfront | 100GB data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts 

Cheapest 5G Mobile Handsets from Honor, Xiaomi and Samsung 

Honor: 

Honor 50 5G | Vodafone | £19.50 /pm | £0.00 upfront | 150GB data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts 

Xiaomi: 

Xiaomi 11T 5G | Vodafone | £21.50 /pm | £0.00 upfront | 200GB data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts 

Samsung: 

Samsung Galaxy A32 5G | Vodafone | £15.50 /pm | £0.00 upfront | 105GB data | 24-month contract | Unlimited minutes and texts
